data.system_settings: iPhone XS Max, iOS 12.1.1 Dev Beta 3
data.actual_result: Font does not match previous versions
data.short_description: Font changed in multiple locations as of build 9349
data.steps_to_repro: - View any of these locations: - Typing indicator bar - Username and DiscordTag next to status updater - Anything in user or server settings - Usernames in friends list
